OOC: Well, Kingler, before i say anything i have to ask if Valtron is 
the purified spark of the old Decepticon leader Galvatron or the 
Galvatron who once belonged to me.  Either way, i give you permission 
to use the name, but i would like an answer to the question.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  I have a dilemma. MY char valtron...formerly galvatron are in a 
war inside 
> valtron's head. I dont know who should win. If galva wins hes galva 
again if 
> not he stays a maximals version of galva. POst me your choice.
